COSTMSG: You don't have enough money (upgraded till max)
CATCHFISHMSG: You caught a fish. +1 fishing xp
NOCATCHPETMSG: You didn't catch a pet :(. Better luck next time!
FISHINGUPMSG: Your fishing level was upgraded to %s
INCOMPATDATAMSG: Incompatible data version (unable to load profile)
HELPMSGC:
s/[green]sell[/green]: sells any resources in the inventory
p/[green]profile[/green]: prints stats about the IdleMiner
f/[green]fish[/green]: fishes for treasure
h/[green]hunt[/green]: catches pets
u/[green]upgrade[/green] tool amount: upgrades a tool by amount (eg. u p 1)
q/[green]quiz[/green] difficulty: gives you a quiz (eg. q easy)
[red]exit[/red]/[red]quit[/red]: exits the game
f/[green]farm[/green]: farms
[green]help[/green]: prints this menu again
The available tools are pickaxe, shovel, and hoe
HELPMSG:
s/sell: sells any resources in the inventory
p/profile: prints stats about the IdleMiner
f/fish: fishes for treasure
h/hunt: catches pets
u/upgrade tool amount: upgrades a tool by amount (eg. u p 1)
q/quiz difficulty: gives you a quiz (eg. q easy)
exit/quit: exits the game
f/farm: farms
help: prints this menu again
The available tools are pickaxe, shovel, and hoe
MOBHITMSG: You hit the mob: -%s mob health (%s mob health left)
MOBHURTMSG: You were hurt by the mob: -%s health (%s health left)
WINMSG: You killed the mob: +%s battle xp
WOULDLIKETOEATMSG: You have %s health, would you like to eat?(y/N)
LASTMINELEVELMSG: You are on the last mine level
